text: 1.11-12: Ef 1.11; 1.18-19; 3.16; 4.2Nza Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav, nza kha suambara mbui, ana won ŋkasŋkar vhuuŋ bakɨmen, ana za mbar kɨrga ŋkasŋkagir nden nɨɨnga, nde thɨgɨ havhargip, simtɨgi ndiv, mbarav kɨv, mba simtɨgi ganɨrim, nta ŋgɨv vhɨzɨrga. Nde ndikndigɨp, Dara phorgɨ suaŋv, anan ndikndigɨrga. Ana nden kurkurigim, nde tɨvir vhuuiŋra zɨn vui. Nde maaŋ mbuim, ana nden mbuigi bigir vhuuiŋ, nde nta ndirga. Nde Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi phorgɨp mba bigi ndirga. Nde mba gumgi gu mbigi phorgɨp Fhe Bakɨmen, vhava ŋaarar kɨrga.
